Border Rejuvination East Lothian

Achillea ‘Salmon Beauty’

This garden border was rejuvinated to demonstrate planting perennials with grasses for a local plant nursery. Geum Princes Juliana and Nasella tenuissima Verbena bonarensis and Calamagrostis ‘Karl Forester’

Winter Planting

Border in Winter - grasses are great for creating winter interest Laying out plants ready for Planting
